item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 17, 2024 at 7:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. UK inflation falls less than expected to 3.2% in March
2. Tesla asks shareholders to approve move to Texas and ratify Musk’s pay
3. Powell says US inflation ‘taking longer than expected’ to hit target
4. Trump falls $75mn behind Biden in money race as donor base shrinks
5. Hardline Republicans balk at US Speaker’s Ukraine aid plan
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, April 17, 2024 at 7:30 PM UTC
